description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. This game is a third person shooter fighting with huge enemies.(3 stages and 2difficulty levels) Even players who aren't proficient in shooters can enjoy the game thanks to the auto-aiming system. Multiplayer deathmatches are also supported via Live and Systemlink.
